Query: How do I configure my static DNS in interfaces?

ul_52474: Setup static IP in redhat 6
Top-3 Scripts:
ul_235264: auto dummy0
iface dummy0 inet static
   address 10.10.0.1
   netmask 255.255.255.0
   post-up ifconfig dummy0 multicast
